body.message:
Found a match for @{body('Parse_JSON_Domain')?['ioc_value']}
The score is @{body('Parse_JSON_Domain')?['score']?['total']}. It was first seen on @{formatDateTime(addToTime('1970-01-01T00:00:00Z', int(body('Parse_JSON_Domain')?['fseen']), 'second'), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}; last seen on @{formatDateTime(addToTime('1970-01-01T00:00:00Z', int(body('Parse_JSON_Domain')?['lseen']), 'second'), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}.
The associated tags are: @{body('Parse_JSON_Domain')?['tags']?['str']}
Related threats: @{body('Parse_JSON_Domain')?['threat']}
Data was found on the following resources:
@{body('Parse_JSON_Domain')?['src']?['name']}
References:
@{replace(body('Parse_JSON_Domain')?['src']?['report'], ',', '\n ')}
Raw reponse:
@{body('Parse_JSON_Domain')}

metadata.author: Yury Sergeev
metadata.comments: This playbook uses the RST Cloud API to automatically enrich IP, Domain, URL, Hash entities in incidents generated by Sentinel.

releaseNotes.title: Enrich multiple entities - RST IoC Lookup
